column1: Little Goat Diner////- French toast: not an ordinary French toast but the most custardy textured puffy French toast with an egg embedded in it toad in the hole style. But it doesn't stop there
column2: pieces of tasty fried chicken tenders are on top along with strawberries and syrup! This was my hub's order but I may have stole quite a bit after he offered me a try bite. ;-) 4.75 stars
